scripts.android:build-prod-release: npx yarn env:prod && npx eas build --platform android --profile production-release
scripts.android:build-prod-debug: npx yarn env:prod && npx eas build --platform android --profile production-debug
scripts.ios:build-prod-release: npx yarn env:prod && npx eas build --platform ios --profile production-release
scripts.ios:build-prod-debug: npx yarn env:prod && npx eas build --platform ios --profile production-debug
scripts.android:build-stg-release: npx yarn env:stg && npx eas build --platform android --profile staging-release
scripts.android:build-stg-debug: npx yarn env:stg && npx eas build --platform android --profile staging-debug
scripts.ios:build-stg-release: npx yarn env:stg && npx eas build --platform ios --profile staging-release
scripts.ios:build-stg-debug: npx yarn env:stg && npx eas build --platform ios --profile staging-debug
scripts.android:build-dev-release: npx yarn env:dev && npx eas build --platform android --profile development-release
scripts.android:build-dev-debug: npx yarn env:dev && npx eas build --platform android --profile development-debug
scripts.ios:build-dev-release: npx yarn env:dev && npx eas build --platform ios --profile development-release
scripts.ios:build-dev-debug: npx yarn env:dev && npx eas build --platform ios --profile development-debug
scripts.android:dev: npx yarn env:dev && APP_VARIANT=development npx yarn expo start --android
scripts.android:stg: npx yarn env:stg && APP_VARIANT=staging npx yarn expo start --android
scripts.android:prod: npx yarn env:prod && APP_VARIANT=production npx yarn expo start --android
scripts.ios:dev: npx yarn env:dev && APP_VARIANT=development npx expo start --ios
scripts.ios:stg: npx yarn env:stg && APP_VARIANT=staging npx expo start --ios
scripts.ios:prod: npx yarn env:prod && APP_VARIANT=production npx expo start --ios
scripts.web:dev: npx yarn env:dev && APP_VARIANT=development npx expo start --web
scripts.web:stg: npx yarn env:stg && APP_VARIANT=staging npx expo start --web
scripts.web:prod: npx yarn env:prod && APP_VARIANT=production npx expo start --web
